name: Anti Theft Alarm
description: With this easy-to-use application, youll protect your phone from theft and unauthorized access. The program will alert you when someone takes your phone, takes it out of your pocket, unplugs the power, disconnects the headphones or steals and replaces your SIM card. In last case you can also be notyfied with a text message or an email with location of the stolen device on the map.   Features:  * Protection against taking the phone from your pocket or bag - the program will detect and alert you with a loud alarm if someone tries to take it out of your pocket, for example during a bus or tram ride, in a crowd on the street,  * Protection against disconnection of the charger - when the charger is disconnected, the alarm automatically starts.  * Protection against uncontrolled use by others - secure your phone at school, at work, at home so that unauthorized people - colleagues, children - cannot access your correspondence, photos and videos.  * Alarm against headphones disconnect - theft protection starts an alarm when the headphones are disconnected from the phone.  * Alarm SIM - If the thief changes the SIM card on the phone, an alarm will sound when the phone is restarted.  NOTE - EVERY PHONE CAN BE STOLEN, BUT ANTI THEFT MAKES IT MORE COMPLICATED!
